text: Almost Naked Animals is a Canadian Flash-animated children's television series produced by 9 Story Media Group for YTV. The series was created by Noah Z. Jones (who also created Fish Hooks, Pickle and Peanut and The 7D), and is based upon an art website he created in 2005. The series premiered on January 7, 2011 and ended on May 22, 2013 on YTV in Canada. It also aired on Cartoon Network in the United States on April 11, 2011. Category:Cartoon Network series Category:Canadian television series
title: Almost Naked Animals
